price: Kuma bã dõmin falalar Allah ba, a kanka, da rahamarSa, haƙĩƙa, dã wata ƙungiya daga gare su ta himmatu ga su ɓatar da kai. Kuma bã su ɓatarwa fãce kansu, kuma bã su cũtar ka daga kõme, Kuma Allah Yã saukar da Littãfi da hikima gare ka, kuma Ya sanar da kai abin da ba ka kasance kã sani ba. Kuma falalar Allah tã kasance mai girma a gare ka.
arabic: وَلَوۡلَا فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكَ وَرَحۡمَتُهُۥ لَهَمَّت طَّآئِفَةٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ أَن يُضِلُّوكَ وَمَا يُضِلُّونَ إِلَّآ أَنفُسَهُمۡۖ وَمَا يَضُرُّونَكَ مِن شَيۡءٖۚ وَأَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ وَعَلَّمَكَ مَا لَمۡ تَكُن تَعۡلَمُۚ وَكَانَ فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكَ عَظِيمٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walawlā faḍlu al-lahi ʿalayka waraḥmatuhu lahammat ṭāifatun min'hum an yuḍillūka wamā yuḍillūna illā anfusahum wamā yaḍurrūnaka min shayin wa-anzala al-lahu ʿalayka al-kitāba wal-ḥik'mata waʿallamaka mā lam takun taʿlamu wakāna faḍlu al-lahi ʿalayka ʿaẓīman
